themes.description: This theme covers requests or feedback related to specific trading functionalities, order types, or investment options.
This theme covers complaints about features or functionalities that are absent or unavailable within the platform.
This theme covers feedback related to changes in existing features, user interface updates, or preferences for previous versions of functionalities.
This theme covers issues related to the opening, activation, or setup of trading accounts and specific segments like F&O.
This theme covers issues related to enabling, disabling, or managing specific features within the application, including ease of access and control over these functionalities.
This theme covers concerns about the overall trustworthiness, safety, and reliability of the investment platform, including claims of significant financial loss or fraudulent activity.
This theme covers suggestions for new features, improvements to existing features, or requests for specific product functionalities and incentives.
This theme addresses issues related to account security, data protection, fraudulent activities, and overall trust in the platform's integrity.
This theme covers feedback regarding the process, fairness, and success rates of IPO applications and allotments.
Covers feedback related to the ease of use, intuitiveness, and overall user experience of the application.
Includes suggestions for new features, enhancements, or general improvements to the application's offerings.
Reviews expressing general skepticism about online investing, concerns about market risks, or philosophical disagreements with the business model rather than specific app issues.
General feedback on the overall application experience, including ease of use and positive sentiments.
Feedback on the availability, quality, and helpfulness of investment tools, research, and guidance features within the app.

This theme covers requests for new types of assets, markets, or financial instruments to be made available for investment within the platform. It focuses on expanding the range of investment opportunities.

This theme covers requests for enhancements to how investment portfolios, holdings, and related financial data are displayed and reported within the application. It focuses on improving the clarity and detail of personal investment tracking.
This theme covers suggestions for new features, investment options, or enhancements to existing functionalities.
This theme captures general positive sentiments, compliments, or expressions of satisfaction with the service or application.
Covers problems related to the receipt or calculation of dividends from investments.
This theme captures general feedback on the overall user experience, satisfaction, ease of use, and positive sentiments about the platform.
This theme covers requests for new features, improvements to existing functionalities, or missing information within the application.
This theme covers feedback regarding the responsiveness, interaction, and overall user experience of charting tools, including zooming and scaling.
This theme covers issues and requests related to account setup, profile management, nominee details, KYC, and other administrative aspects of the user's account.
This theme addresses concerns related to personal data handling, privacy policies, data sharing with third parties, and security of user information.
This theme covers feedback related to the organization, display, and management of investments and portfolios within the application.
Quality of advice, recommendations, or educational content provided by the platform.
Covers issues related to the availability, quality, or clarity of educational materials, guidance, and investment advice provided by the platform.
Issues related to activating specific features or services within the application, including delays or failures in the activation process.
